meanings.meaning_en_US: To make great efforts to achieve or obtain something.

examples.sentence: She continues to [strive] for excellence.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她持續追求卓越。

examples.sentence: They must [strive] to meet their goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們必須努力達成目標。

examples.sentence: He always [strives] to improve his skills.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他一直奮鬥以提升自己的技能。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Causing or characterized by extreme distress or sorrow.

examples.sentence: The film had a [tragic] ending that left everyone in tears.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影有一個悲劇性的結局，讓所有人都流淚。

examples.sentence: His life story is a [tragic] tale of loss and redemption.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的生活故事是一個悲劇性的失落與救贖的故事。

examples.sentence: The play depicted a [tragic] hero who made a fatal mistake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部劇描繪了一位犯了致命錯誤的悲劇英雄。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To talk about something with pride.

examples.sentence: He likes to [boast] about his achievements.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡自誇他的成就

examples.sentence: She can't help but [boast] about her new car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她忍不住要吹噓她的新車

examples.sentence: They [boast] of having the best team in the league.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們自誇擁有聯盟中最好的團隊

meanings.meaning_en_US: An act of saying no to something or rejecting an offer.

examples.sentence: His [refusal] to participate surprised everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他拒絕參加讓大家感到驚訝。

examples.sentence: The [refusal] of the application led to an investigation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 申請的拒絕導致了一次調查。

examples.sentence: She faced [refusal] when she asked for help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當她請求幫助時遭到了拒絕。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who translates from one language to another.

examples.sentence: As a professional [translator], she works with multiple languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名專業翻譯者，她使用多種語言工作。

examples.sentence: The [translator] provided an accurate version of the text.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 翻譯者提供了文本的準確版本。

examples.sentence: A good [translator] can make complex texts easy to understand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一位優秀的翻譯者能使複雜的文本變得易於理解。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Special importance or significance given to something.

examples.sentence: She placed great [emphasis] on the need for teamwork.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她非常重視團隊合作的必要性。

examples.sentence: The lecture had an [emphasis] on practical applications.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次講座強調實際應用。

examples.sentence: He spoke with [emphasis] to drive his point home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他語氣強調以使他的觀點更明確。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Very unhappy or uncomfortable.

examples.sentence: She felt [miserable] after failing the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 考試失敗後，她感到悲慘。

examples.sentence: The weather was so cold that I felt [miserable] all day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 天氣冷得讓我整天感到悲慘。

examples.sentence: He lived a [miserable] life after losing his job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 失去工作後，過著悲慘的生活。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of examining something carefully.

examples.sentence: The [inspection] revealed several safety issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 檢查揭示了幾個安全問題。

examples.sentence: They scheduled an [inspection] of the premises.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們安排了對場地的檢查。

examples.sentence: The annual [inspection] is mandatory.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 年度檢查是強制性的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Based on or in accordance with what is generally done or believed.

examples.sentence: The artist chose a [conventional] style for the portrait.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位藝術家為肖像選擇了一種傳統的風格

examples.sentence: His views are quite [conventional] compared to others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 與其他人相比，他的觀點相當慣例

examples.sentence: She preferred [conventional] methods of teaching.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡傳統的教學方法

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to or involving technology.

examples.sentence: The [technological] advances have changed our lives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 技術的進步改變了我們的生活

examples.sentence: We need [technological] solutions to modern problems.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要技術的解決方案來應對現代問題

examples.sentence: His work focuses on [technological] innovations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的工作專注於技術創新

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of first importance; main.

examples.sentence: Education is a [prime] focus of the new policy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教育是新政策的主要焦點。

examples.sentence: This is a [prime] example of teamwork.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是一個團隊合作的主要範例。

examples.sentence: They have a [prime] location in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在市中心有一個優越的位置。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Fabric woven from flax, used for making clothes or tablecloths.

examples.sentence: She preferred [linen] sheets for their breathability.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡亞麻床單，因為透氣性好

examples.sentence: The table was set with fine [linen] napkins.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 桌子上擺著精緻的亞麻餐巾

examples.sentence: He wore a [linen] shirt during the summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他夏天穿著亞麻襯衫

meanings.meaning_en_US: At the present time, in contrast with the past.

examples.sentence: [Nowadays], people rely heavily on technology.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如今，人們非常依賴科技。

examples.sentence: Finding a good job is tough [nowadays].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如今找到一份好工作非常困難。

examples.sentence: Many choose to work remotely [nowadays].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如今，許多人選擇遠程工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of nations or regions ruled by a single sovereign authority.

examples.sentence: The Roman [empire] was known for its vast territories.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 羅馬帝國以其廣大的領土而聞名。

examples.sentence: She studied the fall of the Ottoman [empire].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她研究了奧斯曼帝國的衰落。

examples.sentence: Ancient [empires] often expanded through conquest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 古代帝國通常通過征服來擴展。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A gathering of people who have been separated.

examples.sentence: The family planned a [reunion] for the holidays.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家族計劃了在假期的重聚。

examples.sentence: High school friends organized a [reunion] ten years later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 高中朋友在十年後組織了一次重聚。

examples.sentence: Their [reunion] was filled with laughter and memories.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的重聚充滿了歡笑和回憶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To throw back light, heat, or sound from a surface.

examples.sentence: The water will [reflect] the sunlight beautifully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水面會美麗地反射陽光。

examples.sentence: She likes to [reflect] on her day before bed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在睡前反思一天的事情。

examples.sentence: Mirrors [reflect] images perfectly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鏡子能完美地反射影像。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A hollow part into which something fits, for example, a light bulb or a plug.

examples.sentence: Please plug the charger into the [socket].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請將充電器插入插座。

examples.sentence: The light [socket] needs to be replaced.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 燈座需要更換。

examples.sentence: He checked the [socket] to see if it was working.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他檢查了插座以確定其是否正常工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Fail to care for properly.

examples.sentence: Don't [neglect] your health.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要忽視你的健康。

examples.sentence: The garden was [neglected] for years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個花園多年來未被照顧。

examples.sentence: They often [neglect] their emotional needs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們經常忽視自己的情感需求。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of people convened for advice or decision-making.

examples.sentence: The city [council] meets every month to discuss local issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 市議會每個月會面對面討論地方問題。

examples.sentence: She was elected to the student [council] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去年當選為學生會成員。

examples.sentence: The advisory [council] provided insights on the new policy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 顧問委員會就新政策提供了洞察。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause someone to feel upset, annoyed, or resentful.

examples.sentence: His comments may [offend] some people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的評論可能會冒犯某些人。

examples.sentence: I didn’t mean to [offend] you with my words.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不是故意要冒犯你。

examples.sentence: She felt [offended] by the rude joke.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她覺得被那個粗魯的笑話冒犯了。
